label: uncl8339
comment: Code specifying the level of danger for which the packaging must cater.

values.label: Great danger
values.comment: Packaging meeting criteria to pack hazardous materials with great danger. Group I according to IATA/IMDG/ADR/RID regulations.

values.label: Medium danger
values.comment: Packaging meeting criteria to pack hazardous materials with medium danger. Group II according to IATA/IDMG/ADR/RID regulations.

values.label: Minor danger
values.comment: Packaging meeting criteria to pack hazardous materials with minor danger. Group III according to IATA/IDMG/ADR/RID regulations.

values.label: Not assigned
values.comment: No packaging danger level has been assigned.
